title: Visit of Monuments
part1: Usually, monuments define the culture of a country and its heritage. Pyramids in Africa, temples and pagodas in Asia, castles and museums in Europe ... and many more that we try to discover on each visit.  Monuments help us to dive into the History of countries.
part2: We will list, based on our experience and our visits, the countries where you can visit monuments.
google-description: Each country is unique and full of discoveries and attractions. We will list, based on our experience and our visits, the countries where you can visit monuments.
social-network-description: Visit Pyramids, Temples, Pagodas ... Let's discover the heritage of different civilizations
